claim: Stagira is the birthplace of Plato.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stagira  (  -LSB- stəˈdʒaɪrə -RSB-  )  , Stagirus  (  -LSB- stəˈdʒaɪrəs -RSB-  )  , or Stageira  (  Στάγειρα or Στάγειρος  )  was an ancient Greek city , located in central Macedonia , near the eastern coast of the peninsula of Chalkidice , and is chiefly known for being the birthplace of Aristotle , who was a Greek philosopher and polymath , a student of Plato and teacher of Alexander the Great .
